methods.name: get_schema
methods.description: Request full schema for a table-like object

params.name: num_columns
params.description: Number of column schemas to fetch from start index. May extend beyond end of table

schema.name: table_schema
schema.description: The schema for a table-like object

columns.description: Schema for each column in the table

methods.name: get_data_values
methods.summary: Get a rectangle of data values
methods.description: Request a rectangular subset of data with values formatted as strings

params.name: num_rows
params.description: Number of rows to fetch from start index. May extend beyond end of table

params.name: column_indices
params.description: Indices to select, which can be a sequential, sparse, or random selection

row_labels.description: Zero or more arrays of row labels

methods.name: set_column_filters
methods.description: Set or clear column filters on table, replacing any previous filters

params.name: filters
params.description: Zero or more filters to apply

schema.name: filter_result
schema.description: The result of applying filters to a table

selected_num_rows.description: Number of rows in table after applying filters

methods.name: set_sort_columns
methods.description: Set or clear the columns(s) to sort by, replacing any previous sort columns

params.name: sort_keys
params.description: Pass zero or more keys to sort by. Clears any existing keys

methods.name: get_column_profile
methods.description: Requests a statistical summary or data profile for a column

params.name: profile_type
params.description: The type of analytical column profile

params.name: column_index
params.description: Column index to compute profile for

null_count.description: Number of null values in column

min_value.description: Minimum value as string computed as part of histogram

max_value.description: Maximum value as string computed as part of histogram

mean_value.description: Average value as string computed as part of histogram

histogram_bin_sizes.description: Absolute count of values in each histogram bin

histogram_bin_width.description: Absolute floating-point width of a histogram bin

histogram_quantiles.description: Quantile values computed from histogram bins

freqtable_counts.description: Counts of distinct values in column

freqtable_other_count.description: Number of other values not accounted for in counts

methods.name: get_state
methods.description: Request the current table state (applied filters and sort columns)

table_shape.name: table_shape
table_shape.description: Provides number of rows and columns in table

num_rows.description: Numbers of rows in the unfiltered dataset

num_columns.description: Number of columns in the unfiltered dataset

filters.description: The set of currently applied filters

sort_keys.description: The set of currently applied sorts

column_schema.description: Schema for a column in a table

column_name.description: Name of column as UTF-8 string

type_name.description: Exact name of data type used by underlying table

type_display.description: Canonical Positron display name of data type

timezone.description: Time zone for timestamp with time zone

type_size.description: Size parameter for fixed-size types (list, binary)

column_filter.description: Specifies a table row filter based on a column's values

column_index.description: Column index to apply filter to

compare_op.description: String representation of a binary comparison

compare_value.description: A stringified column value for a comparison filter

set_member_values.description: Array of column values for a set membership filter

set_member_inclusive.description: Filter by including only values passed (true) or excluding (false)

search_term.description: String value/regex to search for in stringified data

search_case_sensitive.description: If true, do a case-sensitive search, otherwise case-insensitive

column_quantile_value.description: An exact or approximate quantile value from a column

q.description: Quantile number (percentile). E.g. 1 for 1%, 50 for median

exact.description: Whether value is exact or approximate (computed from binned data or sketches)

column_sort_key.description: Specifies a column to sort by
